void CTPushButtonView::SetDefaultPushButtonHeight (  XYDIM  height  ) 
 

APOXI-Internal method.

This method sets the PushButton's default height. It is called by CustomizableTheme from its Update(...) method. It shouldn't be necessary for application programmers to use it.
